hero.title: CircuThai sequences for gentle drainage
hero.subtitle: Stack circulation friendly moves, sync cues and audio, and stay consistent with daily flows.

features.catalogBody: 15 therapist vetted drills with adjustable durations and body zone tags.
features.builderBody: Tap to add, reorder with arrows, and validate total timing instantly.
features.guidanceBody: Text to speech names, sharp completion beeps, and next step preview.
features.musicBody: Attach looping ambient tracks with their own volume control.

builder.title: Assemble a sequence
builder.emptyTimeline: Add exercises to see the timeline.

run.heading: Guided session
